meanings.definition: relating to or based on the number sixty
meanings.sent1: The clock displayed the time in a sexagesimal format.
meanings.sent2: The sexagesimal system is commonly used in measuring angles.
meanings.sent3: The sexagesimal concept made counting easier for the students.
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of the sexagesimal system was as clear as daylight.
meanings.sent5: The ancient civilization developed a sexagesimal calendar for tracking time.

meanings.definition: a system of counting or measuring in base sixty
meanings.sent1: The ancient civilization used a sexagesimal system for calculations.
meanings.sent2: In sexagesimal counting, each unit represents sixty.
meanings.sent3: The sexagesimal method was a hit at the math fair.
meanings.sent4: The complexity of the sexagesimal system fascinated the mathematicians.
meanings.sent5: Learning the sexagesimal system opened up new possibilities for the students.

meanings.sent1: The historian deciphered the ancient text with a sexagesimal numeral.
meanings.sent2: The tablet contained a series of sexagesimal numbers.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeeper mistakenly priced the item using a sexagesimal number.
meanings.sent4: The code was encrypted using a complex sexagesimal numeral.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map had coordinates written in a mysterious sexagesimal number.
